text_blocks.content: So we are going to break for lunch which Ms. Williams has arranged. Please bear all of my instructions in mind. We'll break for 45 minutes for you to enjoy your lunch and for everyone else to take a lunch break. We will return in 45 minutes with opening statements. And we will stop at 5 p.m. today. Thank you for your attention.
THE COURT: All right. Matters to take up, counsel? MS. COMEY: No, your Honor. MS. STERNHEIM: No, thank you. THE COURT: All right. We'll see you in 45. We're breaking for lunch. Thank you.
